#labels Phase-Requirements
= Task description =
Search engines has shown a growing interest in applying full text XQuery as a a query representation. The task of this exercise is to develop an experimental XQuery parser and if possible an intermediate representation.

= Project sub tasks =
 * Create a lexer for the XQuery 1.0 FT specification using JFlex ([http://xqft-parser.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/etc/xqft.lex see here])
 * Create a parser for the XQuery 1.0 FT specification using CUP
 * Build a intermediate representation (IR)
 * Transform IR into query algebrae
